DOC.brief_summary: The purpose randomize control trial test impact provitamin A carotenoid biofortified maize meal consumption maternal infant vitamin A status .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Biofortified Maize Improve Maternal Infant Vitamin A Status
DOC.detailed_description: Vitamin A deficiency remain major public health problem low middle income country . Approximately 50 % Zambian child think affected . This randomize control trial test efficacy provitamin A carotenoid biofortified maize meal consumption strategy improve vitamin A status among lactate Zambian mother infant . The investigator enroll 255 mother/infant pair three-month study , receive one follow three intervention : 1 ) conventional white maize , 2 ) provitamin A carotenoid biofortified orange maize , 3 ) preform vitamin A fortify white maize .
DOC.criteria: Singleton birth No birth defect Free chronic health condition Infant receive 100,000 IU vitamin A 6 month age Currently breastfeed Not pregnant 9 month post partum Hemoglobin > 8.0 g/dL woman > 7.0 g/dL infant Multiple birth Birth defect Any chronic health condition require regular medical visit Infant receive vitamin A capsule 6 month age No longer breastfeed Pregnant Hemoglobin ≤ 8.0 g/dL woman ≤ 7.0 g/dL infant
